summary:
Ever wondered how many guards where adventurers where did they stash there loot or did people
dabble with daedra and something weird happen well this mod adds riddles jokes new items and of course treasure
descriptionHtml:
Ever wondered how many guards where adventurers where did they stash there loot or did people
dabble with daedra and something weird happen well this mod adds riddles jokes new items and of course treasure but to find the treasure you must go to a place were there are lots of books
and find that special just to keep in mind this is a WIP and i will try and add more stuff every day or
at least think of it and have fun joking around enjoy. this mod will add a npc relating to a famous
joker

v1.0
adds a new dead npc and book of tales and 2 containers with loot and the book includes tales
but the book integrates with a vanilla book i will fix that
author: MissionToHell
